```{r}
library(RMariaDB)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
con_traffic <- DBI::dbConnect(
  RMariaDB::MariaDB(),
  dbname = "traffic",
  host = Sys.getenv("TRAFFIC_HOST"),
  user = Sys.getenv("TRAFFIC_USER"),
  password = Sys.getenv("TRAFFIC_PWD")
)

DBI::dbListTables(con_traffic)
```

```{sql}
#| connection: con_traffic

DESCRIBE ca_los_angeles_2020_04_01

```

```{sql}
#| connection: con_traffic
#| output.var: "ca_sex_stops"


SELECT subject_sex,
  SUM(1) AS total,
  'SF' AS CITY
FROM ca_san_francisco_2020_04_01
GROUP BY subject_sex

UNION

SELECT subject_sex,
  SUM(1) AS total,
  'LA' AS CITY
FROM ca_los_angeles_2020_04_01

GROUP BY subject_sex;

```
